title: Getting your act together!
creator_credit: Sue Johnston and Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology. Communication Services Unit. Television Studios
brief_description: Feeling lost and alone on a large tertiary campus is not an uncommon feeling among new students. Students talk about their expectations, and experiences of tertiary education. Advice is given on finance, housing, study skills and personal support.
creator_credit_for_label: Sue Johnston and Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology. Communication Services Unit. Television Studios
